taskbody.prereq: To perform this procedure, you need the portable storage medium that contains the archive files used in installing the master host.
taskbody.context: This procedure adds files for offline installation to a resource pool host. The files are required in subsequent procedures.
Perform this procedure on each resource pool host in your deployment.

step.cmd: Log in to the target host .
Copy yum-mirror-*.x86_64.rpm from your portable storage medium to /tmp.
Delete the package file, if desired.
